pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:1.11.1: Kd 20:9.4.18 makes it clear how this is supposed to happen. A group of two or three bhikkhunīs should approach the Bhikkhu-sangha and ask for the date of the uposatha and for when to come for the ovāda, if at all. The nuns are essentially finding out who is available for the ovāda and when.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:2.4: For a discussion of the rendering “observance day (ceremony)” for uposatha, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
